column4: can anyone help me? ive installed ubuntu 6.06 on a WD5000YS but grub does not boot :( ive checked /boot/grub/devices.map via a live cd and the menu.lst - everything is correct and my bios settings are also correct. besides the 2 sata drives theres no IDE harddisk
can you pastebin yout menu.lst file for me?
hmmm tell me how :p i have no network connection from the livecd to the machine
i just want to double check the obvious
wait some mins i'll plug the other drive in and boot
i'm finishing up something, just let me know when you got it
http://pastebin.com/929277
http://pastebin.com/929278 device.map
grub does not load, its like if theres no bootloader installed
what happens on boot?
just black?
did you ever try reinstalling grub?
http://pastebin.com/929279 the first 512 byte from the disk
it's possible it configured right but somehow installing to the hd got corrupted
also more then once
sorry... i can't try to keep helping on something i don't know anything more about :(
no problem, thank :(
http://pastebin.com/929279 Line 26 and 27
thats correct, its the msg that grub outputs if it fails to read from the drive
thats the programmcode grub uses to load first
o, sorry... i thought that was from your hd
you know more then me..
but it doesnt help me hehe
